pullRequest.title: Fix on_focus not completing if app process is stopped
pullRequest.bodyText:
Make an abstract class for SyncService common methods
* We want to re-use SyncServiceUtils background sync methods

Schedule focus delay with service
* Focus delay was a postDelay that if the application ended before postDelay ran then on_focus schedule won't happen
* Create OSFocusDelaySync and reuse OSBackgroundSync
* Save unsent time and influences as fast as the user left the application
* Create OSFocusTimeProcessorFactory to get proper processor from influences

New flaky test testAppOnFocus_wontContainOutcomeData_withOutcomeEventFlagsDisabled
Review commit by commit

This change is

nodes.bodyText: We don't want this to be a public method, it should only be called internally by the SDK.

👍 Nice helper!
It was a lot of line changes, would be nice in the future if this it was its own commit. That way it is easier to review the other changes in smaller chunks.

commit.message:
Schedule focus delay with service

* Focus delay was a postDelay that if the application ended before postDelay ran then on_focus schedule won't happen
* Create OSFocusDelaySync and reuse OSBackgroundSync
* Save unsent time and influences as fast as the user left the application
* Create OSFocusTimeProcessorFactory to get proper processor from influences
